类 SmartUIManageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.huotu.huobanplus.smartui.controller.SmartUIManageController

  • @Controller
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROOT\',\'SMARTUI\')")
public class SmartUIManageController
extends java.lang.Object
